channel.title: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]
channel.description:
hey i wanna make full working godwars but i only got bandos as a NPC
so i wanna add kree arra and stuff so i downloaded models and ints
and i know i have to put it in class 5
but what then next?? in npc.cfg or something but how i make them do more then 1 type of attack like range + mage and how to make them hit throught prayer and stuff anyways i hope some cool guy can help me :D

item.title: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

The code isn’t the full code for all the NPC’S.

You need to add the models yourself, and from there you can chose health/attack style/etc.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]

item.title: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:2, topic:373528”]When you got the model ingame, you can now add the hp to the npc.

You can simply do this by opening npc.cfg and add the npcid there, than add the name, and than the combat level and than the hitpoints.

This will make it work in combat.

If you want to give it some attacks you should open npcHandler.java and search for something like getAttackEmote I can’t remember how it was in delta.

Under that you add the id of your npc and under it you add something like this :

random = Misc.random(1); npcs[i].attackType = 1 + random; if (npcs[i].attackType == 1) { npcs[i].projectileId = 1197; } else { npcs[i].attackType = 2; npcs[i].projectileId = 1198; } [/quote]

thx u sure that code is good or is it a half code? or a guess?
becuz i have to copy the code then put it on usb stick and put to my other pc so :s need to be sure hehe

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]

item.title: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

When you got the model ingame, you can now add the hp to the npc.

You can simply do this by opening npc.cfg and add the npcid there, than add the name, and than the combat level and than the hitpoints.

This will make it work in combat.

If you want to give it some attacks you should open npcHandler.java and search for something like getAttackEmote I can’t remember how it was in delta.

Under that you add the id of your npc and under it you add something like this :

random = Misc.random(1);
				npcs[i].attackType = 1 + random;
				if (npcs[i].attackType == 1) {
					npcs[i].projectileId = 1197;				
				} else {
					npcs[i].attackType = 2;
					npcs[i].projectileId = 1198;
				}

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] How to add NPÇ's to server [317]
